channel.title: Dragon-History V4.0|| 5000+ DL [100% Working castle wars, Clan wars, Clan chat]
channel.description:
Hello, i was working a long time to make this source and client,I had ups and downs but i did reach Some of my goals again to release a 4.0. i hope u guys like it ! so here we go! [u]Put a sweet music on and enjoy the Pictures ![/u] ps: u can always go check out V3.0 : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,355327.0.html - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Features in Source V3.0 (scroll down for V4.0!) -Castle wars! -Funpk Area ! -Anti syipkpker -Statius's warhammer added -Statius's warhammer special attack ! -Energy Restore based on ur agility level ! -New Monsters -Chinchompa blast added Realistic hits! -Castle wars Teleport -Castle wars shops -New Pkrewardz added (goes with PKpoints) -Dragon Platebody added with Bonus -Barek godsword added With bonus -Barek godsword special added -Removed some NPC glitches -Bandages like in real Rs -added more npc drops -New Clothes. -Better Pvp. -More In source tutorials
Features in Client V3.0 (scroll down for 4.0!) -New models! -No more client freezing! -New clothes
[b]Features in Source V4.0:[/b] -100% Castle wars u can attack, take flagg, score and gain tickets, use all doors, and many other options. -Clan wars ! Team vs Team, with wait room and other futures ! -Added Construction like 50-60% (u can enable or disable it) -Added New welcome screen. -New home. -Better thieving reward -Replaced revenant minigame to a better place ! -Added new Teleports -Funpk 100% added ! u keep ur stuff -added a message when u reach a 99 skill -replaced shops -Added gelatinnoth mothers -Removed dagganoth kings -100% Clan chat working -Dragon claws 100% working now on players and Monsters! -Added more npcdialogues -Added Points, When u reach 50 points by killing gelatinnoth mothers u will get a reward! -And many other futures for u to discover...
Futures in Client V4.0 Deleted some models to let the client load much faster. Added some few things in client.java (nothing big)
What I am working on? -Pest control - Done -Better barrows system : Spade dig on each hill, realistic barrows hit, realistic rewards. 50% -New minigame - done -I want to add like 20-30 new models in the new client. 30% -More Monsters. 60% -Portal chambre.30% -Castle wars. 90% Done -Duel arena.50% -Funpk area. 90% Done -Anti syipkpker. Done -Energy regeneration based on ur agility level. Done -Chinchompa like real rs. done -Construction. 50% -New quest. 20% -Summoning. 25% -Clan wars. 70% and alot more !
------------------------------------------------------------
Information u should know:
Server is set up on 43594 port Same for the client Localhost = 127.0.0.1
-------------------------------------------------------------
And finally, what everyone LOVES, Pictures. [b][size=10pt]FUNPK[/size][/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/epq0ec.jpg[/img] [size=10pt][b]
Dragon Claws spec 100%[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2my7y39.jpg[/img]
[size=10pt][b]Clan wars[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/289a046.jpg[/img]
[b]Clan wars[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/z917c.jpg[/img]
[b]Clan wars[/b] [b][IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/2eulbg3.jpg[/img]
Clan wars[/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/f0zuxe.jpg[/img]
[size=10pt][b]Fruit Monster[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/mole.jpg[/img]
[b]Fruit monsters[/b] [IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/2cxtcae.jpg[/img]
[b]New Home[/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/70l075.jpg[/img]
[b]New levelup message[/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/xgi3ix.jpg[/img] [b] New Clothes like rs[/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/118qb8w.jpg[/img]
[b]Same for Female[/b] [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2q2mk1x.jpg[/img]
[b]PvP[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/10nexhh.jpg[/img]
[b]New revenant Spot[/b] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2zeldvd.jpg[/img] [b] New Revenant Spot[/b] [IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/iqeret.jpg[/img]
[b]New revenant Spot[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/jqozux.jpg[/img]
[b]Welcome message[/b] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/jl1pfs.jpg[/img]
[b]New Starters task ![/b] [IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/mkew6q.jpg[/img]
Clan chat 100% [IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/2jdkp4l.jpg[/img]
- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
[b]CONSTRUCTION[/b] [IMG]http://i43.tinypic.com/xqm35g.jpg[/img]
Ok, [b]about Construction:[/b] It still not 100% because, i have to make a boolean inarea so people cannot make objects all over the map so only in a specific area, and i will make more objects in the next update, i already made that you can see ur level of cosntruction, but not ur totalxp.So thats why [u][b]i did Put it in the source, but you have to enable it by removing the /* */ in Clickingmost.java then you will be able to train Construction.[/b][/u]
So its up to you if u want construction for like 50% and work on it, or You just say "No thanks, i will wait till Aintaro make 100% construction".
Thats it, Ofcourse there are still some Tuts / Parts of V3.0 left in the Map Called Tutorials.
Any question u can pm me!
Feel free to post.
------------------ Credits: Delta Aintaro Tuts And people that supported me! ------------------
http://www.mediafire.com/?tzq5y4iurmy
http://uppit.com/v/U1I0J2YA
http://www.2shared.com/file/5290691/9b402497/dragon-history_client_v_3
Thats it, I hope u like ;D
~~Aintaro~~
